articles.author: Alex Donaldson
articles.title: With the closure of Tango Gameworks, Xbox sends an accidental message: it is not a platform for fans of Japanese games - VG247
articles.description: No matter what Xbox leadership says in its livestreams or in statements, one thing remains true: it's relationship with Japan never came first.
articles.content: Japan has always been a sticking point for Xbox. I’ve heard some people at games publishers describe the brand’s fortunes in the country as ‘cursed’. That seems a bit dramatic, but let’s roll with it… [+11575 chars]

articles.description: Helldivers 2 players have rallied together to give the game positive reviews again now that the PSN linking saga has ended.
articles.content:

articles.author: Peter
articles.title: The iPad Pro (2024) tablets with more storage have a faster chipset, double the RAM - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: They are equipped with 8GB or 16GB of RAM, depending on how much storage you pay for. But they get different versions of the M4 chipset too.
articles.content: Apple introduced the new M4 chip yesterday and if you read the fine print, you will see that there are actually two binned versions of that chip. Not too unusual, except that for the first time both … [+3711 chars]

articles.title: Nintendo Direct June 2024 Confirmed To Boost An Otherwise Quiet Year For Switch - Nintendo Life
articles.description: Currently only two first-party games confirmed
articles.content: I'm honestly really glad we're getting one final Direct dedicated solely to Switch news before the successor releases. Now is the time for ports, remakes, DLC, and NSO titles. Still a lot of exciting… [+1609 chars]
